handoffs.summary: Implemented AutoTerminator service with heartbeat tracking, configurable idle timeout, ECS task termination, final status capture, and cost savings metrics. 47 tests passing.
Code reviewed: follows existing patterns (spawner-service, worker-logs, graceful-shutdown), proper TypeScript strict types, ESLint clean, exports consistent with codebase conventions.
All 281 tests passing across 8 test files. TypeScript typecheck, ESLint lint, and build all pass.
